content.description: South Face of Haystack, left of center and 12 m right of the Driving dihedral, is Student of the Future. A face boulder problem with 1 bolt leads to a classic 'cutter' expanding flake, then a few more face climbing bolts and easier angled rock to the summit.
content.protection: bolts, quick draws, 1+ set cams, sling
content.location: South Face of Haystack, left of center and 12 m right of the Driving Dihedral 5.11a and left of Drifting 5.7

content.description: The most obvious natural  route on the south face, well towards the west end of the rock. A discontinuous crack rises from the base to a bolted belay at about 120 feet. There are several cruxes, the first right off the deck. One can rappel from the belay anchors, or do a second pitch with a few  tricky moves directly above the belay, leading to easier ground and the 'summit'. Descend/scramble westwards to get off.
content.protection: rack to 3", bolted anchor top of first pitch. Rated 5.7 in Collins/White.
content.location: See picture, west end of south face, obvious curving/discontinuous crack, with some bulges.

climbs.name: Mr. Ziggy
climbs.fa: Greg Collins, Sue Miller & Mike Wood 1989

content.description:
A fun route up improbable features.

Start out either to the left up a low angle trough which leads to the stance below the business of the route, or, follow somewhat sparse bolts straight up the face just right of the crest of the prow below the route.

Climb up thin seam with little to no pro for further than comfortable until a seam comes in from the right and there's a fat piton to clip. Â Follow seam up as it rolls over to the left.

Finish at anchor atop Mystery Road.
content.protection: A selection of nuts and cams from small to medium-ish.  Slings and draws to match.
content.location: Just right of Mystery Road and left of the Big Boy Chimney.

content.description:
Steep, short, left facing dihederal, leftside of Haystack Rock.

Steep, jamming, mini classic to top of pillar then easy wind polished face to summit.
content.protection: 1.5 sets cams, fingers through hand sized.
content.location: The west side of pillar, Blood Money 5.10b ***, eastside is the Driving Dihederal 5.11a ***
